## ContextualArabicConverter.convert() method

Converts isolated arabic characters into their contextual form.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
convert(input: string): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  input | string | String with isolated arabic characters. |

<b>Returns:</b>

string
